bio: I'm a software engineer with a unique background in education and mathematics. After years of teaching, I discovered my passion for building technology that makes a difference. I combine analytical problem-solving with a deep understanding of user needs to create applications that truly serve their communities.

journey.title: My Journey
paragraphs: My path to software engineering wasn't traditional, but it was intentional. As a mathematics teacher, I saw firsthand how technology could transform learning and solve real-world problems.

This realization led me to pursue Computer Science at MSU Denver, where I combined my love for problem-solving with technical skills. Today, I bring that same passion for education and empowerment to every line of code I write.

values.title: User-Centered Design
values.description: Every application should serve its users' needs first and foremost.

values.title: Clean Code
values.description: Writing maintainable, well-documented code is just as important as making it work.

values.title: Continuous Learning
values.description: Technology evolves rapidly, and so should I. I'm always learning new tools and techniques.

values.title: Community Impact
values.description: The best projects are those that make a positive difference in people's lives.
